gemini_config.system_instruction: Using the uploaded product image of MacBook Pro, create an engaging lifestyle scene showing realistic usage in Office. Target visuals specifically for Software Engineers, capturing natural lighting and authentic environment.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Using the uploaded product image of MacBook Pro, create an engaging lifestyle scene showing realisti..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
